info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 28 at 2:31PM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Aransas and southeastern San Patricio Counties through 315 PM CDT... At 231 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Gregory, or 7 miles northeast of Portland, moving southwest at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Portland, Taft, Ingleside, Aransas Pass, Gregory, Ingleside On The Bay and Taft Southwest. This includes US Highway 181 between mile markers 630 and 644. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
